title: Basic Lambda Expression
description:
Create a list of names and sort it by length (shortest first) using a lambda.

List: ["Charlie", "Bob", "Alice", "Dan"]

Print the first name after sorting.

Expected output: Bob
instructions:
Create a list of names and sort it by length (shortest first) using a lambda.

List: ["Charlie", "Bob", "Alice", "Dan"]

Print the first name after sorting.

hints.text: Use list.sort((a, b) -> comparison) with a lambda
Compare lengths: a.length() - b.length() for ascending order

commonMistakes.mistake: Using Arrays.asList() which returns fixed-size list
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap with new ArrayList<>() to make it mutable
